abstract: Former couple and business partners Julian Peploe and David Ryan took about ten years to finish construction on East Meredith, NY, home they share, doing much of the work themselves; house, set on 90 acres, is neo-colonial design with modernist interior.
lead_paragraph: Julian Peploe and David Ryan are no longer a couple. They still produce a line of lamps together, and share a house in East Meredith, N.Y.

headline.main: A Colonial-Style Home in the Catskills, Built to Look Old

snippet: Julian Peploe and David Ryan are no longer a couple. They still produce a line of lamps together, and share a house in East Meredith, N.Y.
